text: Anthony Keith Book (4 September 1934 â€“ 13 January 2025) was an English football player and coach. He played as a right-back. Book was known for playing with the Manchester City from 1966 to 1974, making over 240 appearances for the team. He also managed the team from 1974 to 1979. Book died on 13 January 2025 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2025 deaths Category:English footballers Category:English football managers Category:People from Bath, Somerset Category:Plymouth Argyle F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Somerset
title: Tony Book
